import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Toto'; cardListRow = [ {text: 'This is a card'}, {text: 'This is a card'}, {text: 'This is a card'}, ]; cardListColumn = [ {text: 'This is a card'}, {text: 'This is a card'}, {text: 'This is a card'}, ] }
Brief Angular
